title: Walk_feedback variables not loaded in drcsim-nightly AtlasSimInterface_1.1.0

content.raw:
The following variables remain 0 after the first set of 4 steps is entered and during execution of those steps. They used to change in version 1.0.8

.walk_feedback.t_step_rem,
.walk_feedback.current_step_index,
.walk_feedback.next_step_index_needed,
.walk_feedback.status_flags

Suspect code:

drcsim/ros/atlas_msgs/AtlasPlugin.cpp L1762

  _fb->walk_feedback.t_step_rem = _fb->walk_feedback.t_step_rem;

L1969

    this->AtlasControlOutputToAtlasSimInterfaceState(
      &(this->asiState), &(this->controlOutput));

seems to be duplicated by switch statement at line 1991

Otherwise I don't see why these variables are not being updated.
content.html:
The following variables remain 0 after the first set of 4 steps is entered and during execution of those steps. They used to change in version 1.0.8

.walk_feedback.t_step_rem, .walk_feedback.current_step_index, .walk_feedback.next_step_index_needed, .walk_feedback.status_flags

Suspect code:

drcsim/ros/atlas_msgs/AtlasPlugin.cpp L1762

_fb->walk_feedback.t_step_rem = _fb->walk_feedback.t_step_rem;

L1969

this->AtlasControlOutputToAtlasSimInterfaceState(
  &(this->asiState), &(this->controlOutput));

seems to be duplicated by switch statement at line 1991

Otherwise I don't see why these variables are not being updated.
